comments:
Self hosting latest as of time of this bug.

The location looks like:
   :extssh:dev.eclipse.org:/home/eclipse

note there is no name.

The offending line is:

		userText.setText(info.getUsername());

which should check for null (or, getUsername() should be empty string).

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Argument cannot be null
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:1873)

Looking at senders, it doesn't appear that anyone relies on the username == 
null.  So get'er of CVSRepositoryLocation should return empty String in this 
case to make callers safe.
